segments.text: You are speaking with Ryan . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ryan , this is Malia , and I need to call in sick today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went hiking and have terrible poison oak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I got it on Saturday , but it just showed up today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you doing for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The doctor prescribed an ointment and gave me a shot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . You probably should be much better by tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
